item.description: At our first meeting, we'll say hello to each other and learn about how we each got interested in tea. For those who are new to tea, I will give a brief introduction to the world of tea. I plan to serve a top grade Lungjing (green) with a few tidbits. For future meetings, you are welcome to suggest teas to sample.
item.how_to_find_us: This is across the street from Bertucci's, behind parking lot, 2nd floor.
item.name: Boston Tea Connoisseurs July Meetup
